meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Todd Coleman Maggie Schreiter Will Anderson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6989.

td.p: Todd Coleman, a physics professor from River Falls, Wisconsin
Maggie Schreiter, an artist and stay-at-home mom from Ewing, New Jersey
Will Anderson, a senior legislative aide originally from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,600)

tr.td: THE BIG PICTURE
SPORTS SHORTS 2014
JUST FOR THE ELEPHANT
ALL THINGS CONSIDERED
NATIONAL PUBLIC RADIO
THIS IS N-P-R
(Alex: And each correct response will contain those letters in that order.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'More than 130 feasters feast in "Wedding Feast at Cana"; no wonder it takes up 22 X 82 1/2\' in this Paris museum')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: More than 130 feasters feast in "Wedding Feast at Cana"; no wonder it takes up 22 X 82 1/2' in this Paris museum

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
